name: Solitaire – Classic Card Game
description:
Brand new Solitaire Journey, based on classical game play.
Addictive and challenging, wonderful design and intuitive UI.

Feature:
The world scenic themes, backgrounds, card back
Winnable deals
Draw 1 card
Draw 3 cards
Single tap to place a card or drag and drop
Standard Klondike scoring
Smart hints show potentially useful moves
Auto-collect cards on completion
Auto-save game in play
Statistics all your scores
Daily challenges and achievements

Subscription:
Solitaire Subscription is an optional subscription that gives you play without any ads.

You can subscribe to Solitaire for a term of one month or for one year. The monthly term costs US$2.99. The yearly term costs US$21.49. The subscriber's iTunes Account will be charged when the purchase is confirmed.

Subscriptions renew automatically unless automatic renewal is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current term. Subscriptions may be stopped by turning off automatic renewal at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. A subscription cannot be cancelled in the middle of its term.
